name: Venugopal Yara
summary: Results-driven Staff Full-Stack Software Engineer with over 12 years of experience designing, developing, and deploying high-impact enterprise and AI-driven applications. Expert in JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, C#, and Java, with strong proficiency in React, Node.js, Django, Flask, .NET Core, and AWS. Proven ability to lead end-to-end software delivery — from architecture and design to deployment and optimization — across web, mobile, and cloud ecosystems. Skilled in machine learning engineering, MLOps, and cloud-native architectures, delivering scalable, secure, and intelligent solutions for healthcare, logistics, and financial domains. Passionate about mentoring teams, driving technical innovation, and bridging the gap between AI models and production-grade systems to create measurable business value.

experience.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer
bullets: Architected scalable React/Next.js frontends with TypeScript, Redux Toolkit, and SSR for performance and SEO.
Built AI-powered personalization and content-generation features using OpenAI, LangChain, and TensorFlow.
Developed and deployed Python microservices with FastAPI, Flask, and C#/.NET 8 for real-time data pipelines.
Created and deployed ML pipelines for prediction and classification using AWS SageMaker, PyTorch, and scikit-learn.
Integrated GraphQL and REST APIs for data synchronization and schema federation.
Led architecture modernization, reducing load times by 45% through dynamic imports and code splitting.
Implemented DevOps automation with Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Docker, and Kubernetes.
Managed infrastructure-as-code deployments via Terraform on AWS.
Oversee accessibility, localization, and internationalization for multiple markets.
Mentored 7+ engineers across React, Python, and cloud engineering disciplines.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
bullets: Designed cloud-native full-stack apps with React, Redux-Saga, Node.js, and TypeScript.
Built backend services with Python (Django REST Framework) and GraphQL API layers for flexible integrations.
Engineered AI-based data insights and recommendation features using TensorFlow and pandas.
Integrated AWS Cognito, S3, Lambda, and SageMaker for authentication, storage, and ML deployments.
Orchestrated microservices with Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS EKS.
Implemented event streaming with Kafka and Socket.io for live dashboards.
Designed CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and CodeBuild for automated testing and deployment.
Reduced latency 35% through advanced caching and API query optimization.
Coordinated Agile development with product, QA, and DevOps for enterprise release cycles.
Authored architectural diagrams, tech specs, and performance documentation for team onboarding.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
bullets: Developed mission-critical web and mobile tools using React, Angular, and Node.js/NestJS.
Built RESTful APIs and backend systems in Node.js, Express, and C#/.NET for logistics operations.
Designed real-time data visualization dashboards using D3.js and Highcharts for delivery analytics.
Implemented microservice architecture, improving fault tolerance and modularity.
Managed WebRTC-based communication systems for internal audio/video collaboration tools.
Integrated JWT/OAuth 2.0 authentication and role-based access control.
Automated build, test, and deployment pipelines using Jenkins, Docker, and Nexus.
Optimized SQL and NoSQL database queries for high-volume data environments.
Designed cron-based background services and batch processing tasks.
Mentored junior developers, implemented code review standards, and ensured best practices.

experience.title: Full-Stack Engineer
bullets: Built cross-platform front-end applications using React, AngularJS, HTML5, and Bootstrap.
Implemented responsive UI/UX for mobile and web using CSS3, SASS, and modern layout techniques.
Designed RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.js for data management and authentication.
Developed database schemas and queries in MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB.
Built hybrid mobile applications with React Native and Ionic.
Implemented JWT-based authentication and middleware authorization layers.
Integrated CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins for continuous integration and deployments.
Worked with designers to ensure pixel-perfect implementation of Figma prototypes.
Conducted performance optimization, debugging, and post-launch maintenance.
Documented REST endpoints and reusable component libraries for internal use.
